Gene.FullName: PMS1 homolog 2, mismatch repair system component

Classification.Comment: The c.2281_2284delGTCA pathogenic mutation, located in coding exon 14 of the PMS2 gene, results from a deletion of 4 nucleotides at nucleotide positions 2281 to 2284, causing a translational frameshift with a predicted alternate stop codon (p.V761Lfs*6). This variant is considered to be rare based on population cohorts in the Genome Aggregation Database (gnomAD). This alteration is expected to result in loss of function by premature protein truncation or nonsense-mediated mRNA decay. As such, this alteration is interpreted as a disease-causing mutation.
